name: solana-agent
title: Solana Agent
description: Interact with the Solana blockchain from Raycast using AI
author: michael_essiet_emsaa

commands.name: model
commands.title: Models
commands.subtitle: Solana Agent
commands.description: Collection of your custom and default model

preferences.name: promptTemplate
preferences.description: Template support {{content}} tag, and it will replace with the content
preferences.title: Prompt template for the website

preferences.name: promptTemplate2
preferences.description: Template support {{content}} tag, and it will replace with the video transcript
preferences.title: Prompt template for the YouTube

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.label: Open AI API Key
preferences.description: Enter your personal Open AI API Key
preferences.title: API Key

preferences.name: privateKey
preferences.label: Solana wallet private key
preferences.description: Enter the private key of the wallet you would like to use
preferences.title: Solana Wallet Private Key

preferences.name: rpcUrl
preferences.label: RPC URL
preferences.description: RPC URL of the provider you'd like to use
preferences.title: Solana RPC URL

preferences.name: isAutoSaveConversation
preferences.label: Enable auto-save conversation
preferences.description: Auto-save every conversation that you had with the model
preferences.title: Auto-save Conversation

preferences.name: isHistoryPaused
preferences.label: Enable pause history
preferences.description: Pause the history of the conversation
preferences.title: Pause History

preferences.name: isAutoLoadText
preferences.label: Enable auto-load selected text
preferences.description: Load selected text from your frontmost application to the question bar automatically
preferences.title: Auto-load Text

preferences.name: isAutoFullInput
preferences.label: Enable full text input initially
preferences.description: Use full text input form when asking question for the first time
preferences.title: Use Full Text Input

preferences.name: isAutoTTS
preferences.label: Enable text-to-speech for every response
preferences.description: Enable auto TTS everytime you get a generated answer
preferences.title: Text-to-Speech

preferences.description: Enable custom model names without selecting from the model API
preferences.label: Enable custom model name
preferences.name: isCustomModel
preferences.title: Custom model

preferences.description: Change the OpenAI's default API endpoint to custom endpoint
preferences.label: Change API Endpoint
preferences.name: useApiEndpoint
preferences.title: Use API Endpoint

preferences.description: Custom API endpoint
preferences.name: apiEndpoint
preferences.title: API Endpoint

preferences.description: Change the default vision model
preferences.label: Change Vision Model
preferences.name: useVisionModel
preferences.title: Change Vision Model

preferences.description: Custom Vision Model Name
preferences.name: visionModelName
preferences.title: Vision Model Name

preferences.name: useProxy
preferences.label: Enable proxy for each request
preferences.description: Each request will be passed through the proxy
preferences.title: Use Proxy

preferences.name: proxyProtocol
preferences.description: Each request will be passed through the proxy
preferences.title: Proxy Protocol

preferences.name: proxyHost
preferences.description: Server address of the proxy
preferences.title: Proxy Host

preferences.name: proxyPort
preferences.description: Server port of the proxy
preferences.title: Proxy Port

preferences.name: proxyUsername
preferences.description: Leave empty if doesn't have
preferences.title: Proxy Username

preferences.name: proxyPassword
preferences.description: Leave empty if doesn't have
preferences.title: Proxy Password

preferences.name: useAzure
preferences.label: Use Azure OpenAI
preferences.description: Use Azure OPENAI rather than OPENAI
preferences.title: Use Azure OpenAI

preferences.name: azureEndpoint
preferences.description: Leave empty if you are not using Azure OpenAI
preferences.title: Azure Endpoint

preferences.name: azureDeployment
preferences.description: Leave empty if you are not using Azure OpenAI
preferences.title: Azure Deployment
